mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.dynasty_id, p.author_id, p.full_ancient_content, p.full_modern_content, p.annotation, p.appreciation, p.background, p.people_appreciation, p.links, ap.name as author, dy.name as dynasty FROM poems p LEFT JOIN authors_poems ap on p.author_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN dynasty dy on p.dynasty_id = dy.id where p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id FROM poems p
ORDER BY p.id ASC LIMIT 1 OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) FROM poems p

SELECT p.id, p.name FROM poems p WHERE p.id IN
#{id}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.dynasty_id, p.author_id, p.background, p.full_ancient_content, p.full_modern_content, ap.dynasty, ap.name FROM poems p left join authors_poems ap on p.author_id = ap.id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
